It’s very close to Agia Anna beach and it has one of the two campings on the island. Paraga beach  has amazing views to  Delos island!. Apart from the camping there are also restaurants and mini markets.
It is situated 6km south from Mykonos Town, between Platis Gialos and Paradise. Paraga offers outstanding swimming, music and food. This beach is very popular with the locals as well as the tourists.
sources.shortName: Best Mykonos Beaches Guide - Mykonos Beaches Map

places.name: Paraga beach

reviews.text:
Great beach! Pristine water and nice vibe.
The con of this beach is that it it small and covered of sunbeds, but the nature is amazing!

P.S.: Scorpio's is a cool club for sunset and partying but not to spend the day (paricularly if you like clear waters). The beach if front of Scorpio's is not even comparable to the main Paraga beach.
Very nice wide beach. Quiet, near to other more ‘party beaches'. Paracha beach is more about sun , water sports and relaxation.

Where there is a paid zone with umbrellas in the sea there are practically no waves and less wind, because it is as if in a corner. But where it is free there are already waves and wind. The free part of the beach area has some trees to take shade under. There was a peacock and chickens. There was also garbage.

places.generalDescription: If you're looking for a secluded beach on Mykonos, Hidden Beach is definitely worth checking out. With its beautiful surroundings and crystal clear waters, this spot is perfect for those who love spending time in nature.

sources.snippet: Hidden Beach is a real insider tip if you are looking for a quiet beach on Mykonos. This little secret gem is nestled in a picturesque landscape and enchants with a picture-perfect panorama. Unique is especially the natural environment as well as the crystal clear sea, which invites you to swim and also snorkel.

places.name: Hidden Beach

reviews.text: Love this place! Found this place on my way to the beach next to Scorpio and stayed here because you have more privacy without beach clubs and many people! The beach is so beautiful and it's also perfect for watching sunsets!
Small and perfect little beach.

People are a disease on earth and on this beach especially! (First picture below) It's my first time on the island and I fell in love with this beach the moment I saw it! It was amazing to chill on and wait for the sunrise, but when the light came I felt ashamed of what the locals and the tourist had left on it! Cigs, condoms packages, bottles and plastic... Don't be an ignorant and CLEAN AFTER YOURSELF!
Otherwise go back where you came from and trash your own home rather then this beautiful nature site

places.generalDescription: Boutique 2 by Cavo Paradiso Club Mykonos, also known as Cavo Paradiso Boutique 2, is a must-visit for electronic music enthusiasts. Located near Paradise beach, the club offers an unforgettable experience that extends into the early morning hours, allowing guests to revel in the stunning sunrise. The boutique within the club allows visitors to create custom Cavo Paradiso shirts using a printer, resulting in vibrant and unique designs.

sources.snippet: The best sand beaches lie on the south coast, with the most talked-about being the twin party beaches Paradiso (very developed, lined by beach bars playing 24-hour music, watersports facilities and a diving centre) and Super Paradiso (less developed than Paradiso, popular with male gay nudists). Closer to Mykonos Town, Ornos is a family-orientated beach with a Blue Flag, 2.5km (1.5 miles) to the south; Agios Ioannis lies in a dramatic bay and featured in the film 'Shirley Valentine', 4km (2.5 miles) southwest; and Plati Gialos is a well-equipped resort beach, 4km (2.5 miles) southeast.

places.name: Boutique 2 by Cavo Paradiso Club Mykonos (CAVO PARADISO BOUTIQUE 2)

reviews.text: Nina working at the front is the best and will help you🙂‍↕️🤍! Really great selection, shirts can be printed in store. Very reasonably priced, hours listed are accurate as we were there right at opening before leaving the island. Jewelry items are real silver, total must haves definitely pick one up 🎧🐟!

Edit:
I bought two printed shirts, and after washing (30°C, soft/gentle program, NO dry cleaning, 400rpm tumbling, no dryer) half of the logo came off 😡
So 30€ for a tank top for nothing. Let's see what happens to the second shirt.

First review:
Great shop, awesome clothing for customization, very friendly staff. Just swing by, buy some stuff and have a good chat.
The people who work here are amazing, they are so available and kind. They make the best personalised T-shirts!!! the shop is clean and tidy.
